content: ChristopherTrimboli: Extremely active contributor who merged 49 PRs this month, with significant cleanup work including removing several plugins (Twitter #4669, Discord #4668, Farcaster #4682, Telegram #4680) that collectively removed over 57,000 lines of code. Led major architectural improvements with PRs like #4500 (implementing Drizzle ORM), #4504 (strict TypeScript types), and #4824/#4839 (plugin registry improvements), while also focusing on deployment infrastructure with #4652 (Fly.io Docker deployment) and #4631 (docs auto-deployer). Maintained high code quality by providing 56 approving reviews and addressing numerous bug fixes, culminating in the v1 release preparation (#4804) that modified over 33,000 lines of code.
